content: this legal text is about a specific case identified as case n° 15292023 involving parties whose names are not mentioned the case has been ongoing for 6 years and 3 months from march 29 2017 to june 27 2023 the court has made a final ruling assigning exclusive ownership of an apartment in taranto to a party referred to as cama another party has been assigned ownership of a property in taranto additionally cama has been ordered to make adjustments in favor of parties referred to as casa cafr and casa with each party receiving 18435 cama is also required to reimburse casa with a sum of 388816 per capita the court has provided reasons for its decision citing article 720 of the civil code the plaintiffs cama and casa have filed a lawsuit against the defendants cafr and casa requesting the dissolution of the inheritance community and the division of assets the defendants object to the application and dispute the disbursements made by casa the court has instructed a technical expertise to assess the properties involved the court will make a decision regarding the division of the residual property and the reimbursement of expenses the ruling assigns ownership of an apartment in taranto to cama and orders them to pay specific amounts to casa and cafr the tribunal will provide further instructions for the division of assets the ruling was made on june 23 2023 and filed with the chancery on june 27 2023
